p: Host cell lipid biosynthesis inhibitors: Viral infections including dengue and ZIKV are known to be associated with alterations in the lipid homeostasis [ 132] and disruptions in the membrane structure of infected cells [ 133]. Cholesterol is found to modulate the host response of several flaviviruses. Although the exact mechanism of this modulation process is yet unclear, inhibition of the biosynthesis pathway of cholesterol could be an attractive therapeutic approach for ZIKV drug discovery.
